comments:
Create a new standard C project. Call it "1234567890...(149 chars)...123456789"
CLick Finish. The error dialog "Error Running Operations" appears with 
message "C/C++ Indexer (Error)". The error icon at the bottom right, when 
clicked brings up "Error Occurred" as the title and "Task Finish with Error. 
Reason:" as the message.
The NPE points to scannerconfig:
